directions: Beat butter, sugars, pudding mix and vanilla in large bowl with mixer until blended. Add eggs and baking soda; mix well. Gradually beat in flour. Stir in chocolate morsels, cranberries and nuts.
Drop teaspoonfuls of dough, 2 inches apart, onto baking sheets.
Bake 8 to 10 min. or until golden brown. Cool on baking sheets 3 min. Remove to wire racks; cool completely.
Dip half of each cookie into melted chocolate. Place on waxed-paper covered baking sheet; let stand until chocolate is firm.
ingredients: 1 (3.3 ounce) package JELL-O White Chocolate Flavor Instant Pudding
1 (12 ounce) package BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate Morsels
2 (4 ounce) packages BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate, melted
title: Cranberry Chocolate-Dipped Cookies
